reporter_caption.center: MATACCHIERO v. YELLOW ALBANY CAB CO., INC., 233 App. Div. 782 (1931)

caption.center: MICHAEL MATACCHIERO, an Infant, by NUNZIO MATACCHIERO, His Guardian ad
Litem, Appellant, v. YELLOW ALBANY CAB CO., INC., and Another, Respondents.
NUNZIO MATACCHIERO, Appellant, v. YELLOW ALBANY CAB Co., INC., and Another,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Third Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgments reversed, on the law and the facts, and new trial granted, with costs, in one action, to the appellant to abide the event. All concur.
